https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9dOyABMxPHwQA3yyfXtWyDLWG7p.jpg Psychological drama about a young, inexperienced film reviewer who falls for the charms of a well-established female colleague. A challenging look at the essence of film critique as well as an erotic encounter between two unequals. Another Man
